allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add GitHub Actions pipeline to deploy poker analytics dashboard to GitHub Pages

Adds a CI/CD workflow that automatically rebuilds and deploys a static HTML
dashboard whenever new JSON replay files are pushed to raw/. The dashboard
includes a sortable player leaderboard, summary cards, and embedded Matplotlib
charts for player statistics, hand analysis, and session trends.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
